author: jeremias
msg: Don't log a stacktrace when a JPEG is encountered that has a bad ICC profile and give a nicer warning message.
Log the event when a CMYK JPEG with an APPE marker is encountered.

author: arnaudsimon
msg: added property for setting max message size before a sync

author: dag
msg: DERBY-2914 new stored procedures, SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_USER_ACCESS, SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_GET_USER_ACCESS, SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_EMPTY_STATEMENT_CACHE() should get documented
Removed a superfluous </topicref>, which broke the building of refman.

author: woonsan
msg: [JS2-791] configure the security constraint on a particular portlet fragment.
Implemented config mode to allow edit security constraints for a portlet fragment.
Now we can add/remove security constraints and update security constraint ref.
To enable this auto config mode, set the following property to true in /WEB-INF/conf/jetspeed.properties
